name: BALLSTAT
0:
”Alexa, ask Ball Stat, how many points does Seth Curry average?”
”Alexa, ask Ball Stat, how many rebounds does Seth Curry average?”
”Alexa, ask Ball Stat, how many assists does LeBron James have in his career?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ball stat
des: This skill allows Alexa to learn about the average and career stats of current NBA players.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
